expert_traj.observation: You are in the middle of a room. Looking quickly around you, you see nothing.
You arrive at loc 4. On the shelf 1, you see a pen 1.
You arrive at loc 10. On the shelf 2, you see a bowl 1.
You pick up the bowl 1 from the shelf 2.
You arrive at loc 4. On the shelf 1, you see a pen 1.
You arrive at loc 2. On the shelf 3, you see a alarmclock 2, a alarmclock 1, and a desklamp 1.
